official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to simplify the requirements for United States nationals to become citizens.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the requirements for naturalization of U.S. nationals to provide that such an individual shall become a citizen upon: (1) establishing to the satisfaction of the Secretary of Homeland Security that the individual is a U.S. national; and (2) taking before an immigration officer within the United States the required oath of allegiance.
